title: Write
introducing-synapsy-text: Synapsy Write is a new way of writing text, using the power of AI.
welcome-desc: Welcome to AI Generation, to get started, enter your OpenAI API key.
result-ph: The generated text will appear here.
no-gen-text: You can find here all your generations.
feature-ai-desc: Harness the state-of-the-art AI technology provided by OpenAI to generate high-quality text based on your input.
feature-versatile-desc: Create different types of writing from a single instruction. Write lets you create emails, paragraphs, essays and much more!
feature-easy-desc: The intuitive user interface ensures that even non-technical users can get started quickly. You can start generating writings in seconds.
open-source-desc: Synapsy's products follow Peyronnet Group's vision: Open-source as a core value. We want to have this journey with you and the community.
